page.title: 08WALKINGTON,PEOPLE AND JOBS.
page.content: THE POPULATION OF WALKINGTON IS TRANSITORY,THE MAJORITY OF THE PEOPLE HAVING LIVED IN THE AREA FOR LESS THAN 20 YEARS WITH A HIGH PROPORTION HAVING LIVED HERE FOR LESS THAN 5 YEARS.MANY PEOPLE COME FROM OUTSIDE NORTH HUMBERSIDE.ONLY A SMALL SECTION OF THE ADULTS WERE BORN IN WALKINGTON.MANY HOUSEHOLDS ARE FAMILIES.OF THE 613 ADULTS ASKED,56 WERE RETIRED eg 9%. THE CHIEF FORMS OF EMPLOYMENT,WHICH ARE MAINLY IN THE NEARBY TOWNS OF HULL AND BEVERLEY,ARE FOUND IN THE PROFESSIONAL SECTOR COVERING A WIDE VARIETY OF FIELDS SUCH AS EDUCATION, HEALTH AND BUSINESS.ONLY A SMALL PROPORTION OF THE POPULATION IS SELF_ EMPLOYED.UNEMPLOYMENT IS LOW. ALTHOUGH A FARMING AREA,THE TWELVE FARMS ONLY EMPLOY 2 OR 3 PEOPLE EACH, AND THESE ARE OFTEN RELATED TO THE FARMER.
